Detailed Description

Helper class to cast entity as a property owner.

Member Function Documentation

virtual PropertyOwnerBase* SimpleClientEntity::EntityPropertyOwner::getChildPropertyOwner ( int  ref  )  const [inline, virtual]

This method returns the child PropertyOwner of this PropertyOwner.

If the child property is not a PropertyOwner, NULL is returned.

Parameters:
childIndex The index of the child to get.

Implements PropertyOwnerBase.

virtual int SimpleClientEntity::EntityPropertyOwner::getNumOwnedProperties (  )  const [inline, virtual]

This method returns the number of child properties this PropertyOwner currently has.

Implements PropertyOwnerBase.

virtual bool SimpleClientEntity::EntityPropertyOwner::getTopLevelOwner ( PropertyChange &  change,
PropertyOwnerBase *&  rpTopLevelOwner 
) [inline, virtual]

Reimplemented from PropertyOwnerBase.

virtual void SimpleClientEntity::EntityPropertyOwner::onOwnedPropertyChanged ( PropertyChange &  change  )  [inline, virtual]

This method is called by a child PropertyOwnerBase to inform us that a property has changed.

Each PropertyOwner should pass this to their parent, adding their index to the path, until the Entity is reached.

Reimplemented from PropertyOwnerBase.

BinaryIStream &  data 
) [inline, virtual]

This method sets a child property to a new value.

childIndex The index of the child property to change.
data A stream containing the new value.
Returns:
The previous value of the property.
